body_html: when I upgraded the tensorflow 1.3 in ubuntu14.04, I got the same error saying"ImportError: libcudnn.so.6: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory", while my cudnn is only cudnn5.1. in the path of /usr/local/cuda/lib64, libcudnn.so.5.1.10 is found. what should I do?
